original_text: Is any thing too hard for the Lord? At the time appointed I will return unto thee, according to the time of life, and Sarah shall have a son.
korean_text: 여호와께 능하지 못한 일이 있겠느냐 기한이 이를 때에 내가 네게로 돌아오리니 사라에게 아들이 있으리라

sentences.original_text: Is any thing too hard for the Lord?
At the time appointed I will return unto thee
according to the time of life
and Sarah shall have a son
